name: Othello
description:
This version of the popular board game(also known as Reversi) was first built into Tsukuda Original's Othello Multivision. It was reprogrammed and re-released in cartridge form for the SG-1000.

The game involves placing discs of your colour on a grid-board, and trying to turn your opponent's discs to your own colour.

releases.comments: First released in 1983, built into the Othello Multivision. Reprogrammed and re-released for SG-1000 in 1985.
